product_name: Bear Grylls Originals Half-Zip Microfleece Top - Kids' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Lighter than a sweater but warmer than a shirt, the Bear Grylls Originals half-zip microfleece kids' top keeps young explorers from feeling the chill in the air during cool-weather adventures. Soft polyester microfleece insulates while remaining breathable. Half-zip opening provides immediate ventilation. Closeout.
short_description: Lighter than a sweater but warmer than a shirt, the Bear Grylls Originals half-zip microfleece kids' top keeps young explorers from feeling the chill in the air during cool-weather adventures.
